result.reason: User finds current inheritance implementation cumbersome and reports issues with multi-selecting connections. This suggests a need to improve batch editing capabilities, likely by allowing implicit inheritance overrides in the property grid and verifying multi-selection behavior.
result.approach: Verify multi-selection functionality in ConnectionTree. Modify ConnectionInfoPropertyGrid to allow breaking inheritance automatically when a property is edited on multiple selected items, simplifying batch updates.
